snippet.title: SILHOUTTES (Official trailer)
snippet.description:
Silhouttes official trailer

Silhouettes is a crime and fantasy horror visual novel, a story about a girl who dreams of silhouettes of missing children and also sees how teenagers suffer in the real world. The girl lives in a small village where disappearances of children and teenagers often occur. She can't understand why she has these nightmares and what they mean.

Silhouettes is a game that will make you experience fear, empathize with the characters, and learn a lot of interesting facts about crime and fantasy. You will be able to influence the story with your choices, and get one of several different endings. Silhouettes is a game for those who love horror, crime and fantasy, and are not afraid to see what is hidden behind the shadows.
